# f5distributedcloud_dns_zone (Resource)

The `f5distributedcloud_dns_zone` resource manages DNS Zones in F5 Distributed Cloud.

DNS Zones define authoritative DNS domains for F5 XC DNS services.

## Example Usage

```hcl
resource "f5distributedcloud_dns_zone" "example" {
  name        = "my-dns-zone"
  namespace   = "system"
  description = "Primary DNS zone"
  domain      = "example.com"
}
```



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `domain` (String) The domain name for this DNS zone.
- `name` (String)
- `namespace` (String)

### Optional

- `description` (String)

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
